flowRoot.flowPara: On each page, there are apps or programs - we have to match them up with their mascots: the numbered zoo animals listed on the last page! To help us, beside each app is it's logo and one or two clues...

Each app also comes with a blank box and a question. When you have worked out the app's mascot, write the matching zoo animal's number in the box, and find that animal's zoo enclosure to answer the question!
You may know some of these apps and programs, some you won't, so we have put a few boxes to give you an idea of what they do. Feel free to ask us questions about them and we'll do our best to answer!

text.tspan: It's an excuse for us to go to the zoo and

flowRoot.flowPara: But it's about something else too - we in BLUG know each other because we all have a common hobby...

It is a way of using phones, tablets and computers, where anybody can learn to change their apps or programs to do what they want. People share what they have fixed so everybody gets better apps! This is called open source.

There are lots and lots (and lots) of programs that work like this, and (because we like a bit of fun) many have cartoon animals as logos... Today, they have all escaped around Belfast Zoo, so we are going to need a hand finding them!
Inside our computers, we had a whole load of programs with animal logos... then somebody dropped a laptop and they all escaped around Belfast zoo!

text.tspan: Can you help us find them?
Websites for all mentioned projects are in
the Attribution section near the back!
